plot: A man appears at the gates of Montaigne castle one winter during the French Wars of Religion. He has been attacked and is seeking refuge.
title: Tandis qu'en bas des hommes en armes
plot_es: A man appears at the gates of Montaigne castle one winter during the French Wars of Religion. He has been attacked and is seeking refuge.
original_name: Tandis qu'en bas des hommes en armes
plot_en: A man appears at the gates of Montaigne castle one winter during the French Wars of Religion. He has been attacked and is seeking refuge.
